verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [V: said] [ARG1: he has instructed the United States Trade Representative to consider $ 100 billion in additional tariffs against China] .
President Donald Trump on Thursday said he [V: has] instructed the United States Trade Representative to consider $ 100 billion in additional tariffs against China .
